Ada's Coding Tutoring

Class Overview

Welcome to Ada's Coding Tutoring! In this personalized class, your student will learn how to program games, websites like this, and whatever else they want to learn. I offer options for block-based coding, Python, HTML/CSS/JS, C++, and Unity. Not only this, this class is a great opportunity to practice English at the same time!

Ada Ke

你好！我的名字叫柯艺琳（Ada）。我现在是一个高中10年纪的学生。我很喜欢编程，不过我也有很多其他的兴趣爱好比如说。
